thread.title: Jets bring 350 rolls of toilet paper because London's is too thin
thread.title_full: Jets bring 350 rolls of toilet paper because London's is too thin

author: jordan.heck@performgroup.com (Jordan Heck)
title: Jets bring 350 rolls of toilet paper because London's is too thin
text:
Jets bring 350 rolls of toilet paper because London's is too thin Sporting News 12 hrs ago jordan.heck@performgroup.com (Jordan Heck) The Jets are headed to London with a desire to win and plenty of good ol' American toilet paper.
AdChoices Apparently the bathroom tissue in England is too thin for U.S. butts and this unfortunate shortcoming required the Jets to plan ahead. So they decided the best plan of attack was to bring a bunch of the thick stuff with them on their trip to face the Dolphins this week.
MORE: Week 4 NFL picks | Coaches on the hot seat | Jets meet with sleep consultant
So how much toilet paper does a professional football team need to satisfy its staff? 350 rolls, according to the New York Times .
“Some may say that’s a little over the top or whatnot, but it didn’t really cost that much, so why not?” said Aaron Degerness, the Jets’ senior manager of team operations. “We’re basically trying to replicate everything that we’re doing here over there.”
Players can now wipe comfortably, knowing they can do so with an appropriate amount of paper between their hands and, well, you know..
